title: NETWORK_OVERRIDE_CLOCK_TIME
content:
0xE679E3E06E3638920xC077BCD6// NetworkOverrideClockTime
void NETWORK_OVERRIDE_CLOCK_TIME(int hours, int minutes, int seconds);Parameters:hours: The hour to set (0-23).minutes: The minute to set (0-59).seconds: The second to set (0-59).Overrides the game clock time for the local player, allowing for manipulation of the in-game time. This native is effective in both multiplayer and singleplayer modes.Note: Passing wrong data (e.g. hours above 23) will cause the game to crash.
codeBlocks:
// NetworkOverrideClockTime
void NETWORK_OVERRIDE_CLOCK_TIME(int hours, int minutes, int seconds);
